project_short_description: A short description of the project
current_job: Complete this sentence: 'I currently work at...'
current_job_title: What is your current job title?
previous_job: Where did you work at your previous job?
company: What is the name of the company where you are applying? E.g., Facebook
job_title: Position for which you are applying
passion_1: Complete this sentence: 'I am passionate about...'
passion_2: Another relevant thing you are passionate about
industry: The industry of the job, i.e., 'software development'
industry_experience_years: Number of years in said industry. (If under 10, use a word, i.e., 'three' instead of '3
framework_experience_years: Number of years using a framework like Flask or Symfony
framework_1: Number of years using a second framework, i.e., Flask
framework_2: Number of years using a third framework, i.e., Webapp2
expert_experience: What are you an expert at? E.g., Python development
expert_tech_1: Name a tool that you use in the thing you're an expert at. E.g., HTML5
expert_tech_2: Name another tool that you use in the thing you're an expert at. E.g., CSS
expert_tech_3: Name one more tool that you use in the thing you're an expert at. E.g., JavaScript
btw_tech: Name another relevant thing you're good at. E.g., PHP
btw_tech_years_experience: How long have you been doing that?
other_relavent_stuff_you_did: What other relevant work have you done? The sentence will start iwth 'I'
other_sentence_about_relevant_experience: Add one more full sentence about relevant experience
